extDescription.message: An AI-powered bookmark manager that automatically generates tags and provides smart search. All data is stored locally and AI services are only called when generating tags. Privacy Policy: https://github.com/zuogl/smart-Bookmark/blob/main/privacy.zh_CN.md

noResults.description: Message shown when no search results

keyboardHint.message: ↑↓ Select | Enter Open | Esc Close | Ctrl+Shift+S/⌘⇧S Quick Search
